CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1957, pg. 17 reads: "6. Dorothy Paul modeled the mink stole which Mrs. Mary Atkinson, 5237 Scheley Ave., is wearing; Sue Warner modeled the marmot mink stole won by Mrs. Mary Hicks, 2208 Snowden. Sam Simon of the American Fur Company awarded the prize furs."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait including Dorothy Paul, Mary Atkinson, Sam Simon of American Fur Company, Mary Hicks, and Sue Warner standing in Syria Mosque for the Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
